===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to be [[angry]]; to get [[upset]]; to be [[mad]]
#: {{zh-x|我 不是 '''生''' 她 的 '''氣'''，而是 '''生''' 自己 的 '''氣'''。|I'm not '''angry''' with her, but I'm '''angry''' with myself.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 為 這 生氣 哦。|So that's what you're '''upset''' about?}}

====Usage notes====
To say "to be angry with somebody", put ''somebody'' + {{zh-l|的}} in between {{lang|zh|生氣}}, for example {{lang|zh|生她的氣}} means "to be angry with her".
